title: How to read webnovel comics for free - Quora

response.answer_text: Do you men comics written and illustrated especially for the web, or comics reproduced on the web. In the latter case, there are several sites that do this. But, usually it’s in violation of US copyright laws (which is why such websites are usually located in other countries). You can find them if you look. Whether or not you should look for places that are illegally profiting from someone else’s work is another question. OTOH, it’s not up to you to look out for the copyrights of others, and the sites are going to be there whether you look or not, as long as the comics companies (and I’m sure they’re aware of these sites) do nothing about it.

After I try many online resources and ask on many forum like Qidian Forum and Reddit, finaly I can have one right answer for myself for “How do I get unlimited Webnovel coins for free?” on Telegram group on a minimalist blog called Telegraph (the blogging platform that doesn't require any kind of registration). So, I found my answer on this telegraph link. Just open the link that will give you the method to get Webnovel Coins for free without hassle. Note: If you want to try Telegraph, you just go to Telegra.ph, and start writing. You can type a title, your name, some text, and add a photo or embed content — tweets and videos, for example — from the internet. Simple text formatting is also supported, and you can edit your post after your done. Hope this help you fellow Webnovel Reader ;)
